data.name: Colonize
data.detailed_description:
Great games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1021100/Aircraft_Carrier_Survival/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1118110/Coal_Mining_Simulator/


Can't wait for the full release? Wishlist our Colonize Prologue and play in January 2022!https://store.steampowered.com/app/1736450/Colonize_Prologue/

Colonize is a combination of survival game and building strategy that takes place during the colonization period - the 17th century. It tells the story of
a settlement in the new world and all the difficulties encountered by the early settlers.

Overview


Colonize is a building simulation and it centers on the economy, management of groups of the population, city management. It is an isometric classic. The player gradually builds a settlement, a city that has a character of a city-state, with everything that goes with it. Gradually, you will make various building improvements, new raw materials, laws, forms of government, and city management.



External missions are another feature that will increase your experience. The player chooses a mission in his city in the respective building, chooses 5 inhabitants for the mission, and sends them into the wilderness!

Colonize has a total of 6 missions, 6 cities that the player must populate: Jamestown, Bermuda, Salem, Boston, Williamsburg, and Providence.



Each city expands the possibilities of the game and increases the difficulty of the conditions of the game such as the weather, the number of possible expeditions, and the size of the ship with which he trades with England.

Key features


  • The player fights against hunger and weather!
  • Native tribes living in North America bring fear to your colonization!
  • Trade with the King and watch out for the pirates!
  • The external missions that will expand your game!


This game is supported using public funding by the Slovak Arts Council.

data.short_description: Colonize is a combination of survival game and building strategy that takes place during the colonization period - the 17th century. It tells the story of a settlement in the new world and all the difficulties encountered by the early settlers.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 3.9GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 @ 3.40GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X 3.8GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290X (4GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
